name: Hoppy Deathmas
description:
you are a character and go to a place but  its been shut down and hoppy ester awaits you for your doom Mr shot whose kindergarten are close by so he brings you back and tags along side Hoppy to kill you and stop you from finding the truth by injecting him with robot fluid but  now he is T posing but evil and his eyes turn red

 Will you beat this game?

Will You Survive?

Find Out in Hoppy DeathMas
